title: Ticket #4970: Add checkpoint server support for vanilla universe checkpointing.
description: The prototype implemented in #4297 will not scale, because it always transfers the checkpoint back to the submit node. We need to be able to use other checkpoint servers. We would probably like an adapter to use the existing standard universe checkpoint server, since that's already deployed as LIGO infrastructure, but it would be OK to start with something like the transferd, instead.
creator: tlmiller
